events.message: I received my order yesterday, but unfortunately the item arrived with a large scratch on the surface and it looks damaged.
The reported issue has been identified as a product defect due to reported damage upon delivery.
The case has been assigned to a support agent for further assistance regarding the damaged product.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the damage to your product. I’m here to help resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged item and the packaging it arrived in? This will help us understand the extent of the defect.
Thanks for the quick response. I’ve attached several photos showing the scratched surface as well as the box it came in.
We apologize for the inconvenience. We can send you a replacement item immediately or provide a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would like to go ahead with the replacement option. Thank you for offering a solution so quickly.
The replacement order has been processed and shipped. You should receive a tracking number shortly. We appreciate your patience.
We are following up to ensure that your replacement product arrived in perfect condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
I received the replacement yesterday and it’s in perfect condition. Thank you for the excellent support!
Glad to hear everything is resolved. Closing the case now but feel free to contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on this support experience.
I completed the survey and rated the support 5 stars. Really appreciated how fast and helpful you were.
This case has been archived automatically after 7 days of inactivity following case closure.
